selected_quotes: Sterile hyper-managed election campaigns contribute to public cynicism and antipathy towards politics #GE2017
So far in #GE2017 lots of stage-managed events. We argue the changing setting of politics is linked to disaffection
We used Election diaries to examine changing spaces of political encounter and anti-politics. ht…
Changing spaces of political encounter are fueling the rise of anti-politics.
Changing spaces of political encounter and the rise of anti-politics: Evidence Election diaries htt…
